text: "Don't Lie" is a song recorded by American country music artist Trace Adkins. It was released in September 1999 as the first single from the album More.... The song reached #27 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Frank Rogers and Chet Biggers. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1999) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|45 |} ==References== Category:1999 singles Category:1999 songs Category:Trace Adkins songs Category:Songs written by Frank Rogers (record producer) Category:Song recordings produced by Paul Worley Category:Capitol Records Nashville singles
title: Don't Lie (Trace Adkins song)
